blogPost.excerpt: All in one influencer search, management and campaign tracking software from Buzzbomb. This is this our first functionality launch and we'll be adding Social Scheduling, Social Monitoring and Competitor Tracking in the coming months.
blogPost.body: All in one influencer search, management and campaign tracking software from Buzzbomb. This is this our first functionality launch and we'll be adding Social Scheduling, Social Monitoring and Competitor Tracking in the coming months.
blogPost.title: Influencers by Buzzbomb - Find, manage and track influencers.
blogPost.author: Isaac Joy

localize.description: Buzzbomb的所有影响者搜索、管理和活动跟踪软件。这是我们首次推出的功能，我们将在未来几个月内增加社交日程安排、社交监控和竞争对手跟踪功能。
localize.tagline: 寻找、管理和跟踪影响者。

localize.description: Buzzbomb的所有影響者搜索、管理和活動跟蹤軟件。這是我們首次推出的功能，我們將在未來幾個月內增加社交日程安排、社交監控和競爭對手跟蹤功能。
localize.tagline: 尋找、管理和跟蹤影響者。

previous.excerpt: Startup benchmark data is fragmented and disorganized, scattered across hundreds of Medium blogs. We are curating the world’s largest library of startup benchmark data, creating market transparency for founders and institutions.
previous.title: Bluelight - The world’s largest library of startup benchmark data

localize.description: 创业公司的基准数据是零散的、无序的，分散在数百个Medium博客中。我们正在策划全球最大的创业公司基准数据库，为创始人和机构创造市场透明度。
localize.tagline: 全球最大的创业标杆数据库。

localize.description: 創業公司的基準數據是零散的、無序的，分散在數百個Medium博客中。我們正在策劃全球最大的創業公司基準數據庫，爲創始人和機構創造市場透明度。
localize.tagline: 全球最大的創業標杆數據庫。
